LanguageData.PressR.Settings.ResetButton.Label: Reset to Defaults
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.ResetButton.Tooltip: Reset all Press-R settings to their default values.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.TabLens.Feature.Label: Tab Lens Feature
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.TabLens.Feature.Descript: Manage thing settings via map interaction when relevant tabs are open.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.TabLens.StorageLens.Enab: Use Tab Lens with the 'Storage' tab to toggle item allowance by clicking on the map.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.TabLens.StorageLens.Over: Show colored overlays on items indicating their allowed/disallowed status in storage.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.TabLens.StorageLens.Rest: Restore previous User Interface state (tab, search, scroll) when Storage Lens deactivates.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.TabLens.StorageLens.Auto: Automatically open the 'Storage' tab when focusing on an item.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.TabLens.StorageLens.Focu: Focus Item in Tab on Click
Filter the tab list to the clicked item/category.
Focus Item in Tab on Hover
Filter the tab list to the hovered item/category.
Requires 'Focus Item in Tab on Click' to be enabled.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.DirectHaul.Feature.Label: Direct Haul Feature
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.DirectHaul.Feature.Descr: Directly command colonists to haul selected items to a specific location.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.DirectHaul.PlacementGhos: Display ghosts showing where items will be placed.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.DirectHaul.StatusOverlay: Show overlays on items indicating their 'Pending' or 'Held' status for Direct Haul.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.DirectHaul.RadiusIndicat: Show a circle encompassing all placement locations.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.DirectHaul.StorageCreati: Show a rectangle preview when creating/expanding storage zones via drag.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.DirectHaul.StorageHighli: Highlight existing storage zones/buildings when hovering in Storage mode.
LanguageData.PressR.Settings.DirectHaul.InvertKeys.En: Swap the modifier keys used for Standard haul and Storage mode.
Cancel the held status for this item in Direct Haul.
LanguageData.PressR.DirectHaul.CancelPendingStatusGiz: Cancel the pending status for this item in Direct Haul.
